org.codehaus.xfire.transport.http
Class XFireServlet

java.lang.Object
  HttpServlet
      org.codehaus.xfire.transport.http.XFireServlet
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoomXFireServlet, PlexusXFireServlet, XFireConfigurableServlet, XFireSpringServlet
public class XFireServlet
extends HttpServlet

A servlet which processes incoming XFire requests. It delegates to the XFireController to process the request.

Since:
Feb 13, 2004
Author:
Dan Diephouse
